comments:
Once restarting after the initial installation of Eclipse Monkey, the Monkey menu item is no longer present.  I have restarted several times and at least once with the "-clean" command-line option, which had no effect.  The following error was logged in my error log:

Message:
Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)

I have been unable to replicate this issue for some time. Please let us know if it continues to occur with the latest version.
